description: Try our easy to follow Choc Mousse Eggs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Mousse Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, using a small sharp knife, cut off pointed ends of chocolate eggs. Fill with mousse and place into an empty egg carton or egg cups. Chill until ready to serve. Top each egg with 1 tsp lemon curd before serving.
